_sText:
What the map has:

- Pool
- Football
- Roulett
- Jails
- Medic
- LR room
- Disco, with 5 included songs.
- Armory
- Loads of secrets and weapons.
- 18 CT
- 28 T

If you've downloaded it and played it please leave a comment on what you think.

-IMPORTANT-
If you plan to have this map on your server, you must toggle sv_cheats 1 and then type phys_pushscale 900 if you want football to work. Change 900 to whatever but 900 is good.

- Version 2.0 - Added teleport to armory in one of the cells. Added discoedit file.
- Version 1.0 - Release
